title: 🚀 Professionally Speaking…
content: I’m a Full Stack Software Engineer, specializing in web application development. My portfolio showcases a myriad of projects, reflecting a wealth of experience gleaned from working with some of the world’s renowned companies like Verizon, Zillow, and the New York Times.

title: ✈️ Wanderlust at Heart…
content: My love for traveling has taken me to over a dozen countries, entailed adventures like hitchhiking from Paris to Marrakech, and even involved living in Airbnbs throughout the US for over two years. Every journey has been a chapter, adding to my story and expanding my worldview.

title: 👨‍👩‍👧 A Peek into My Personal World…
content: I'm a devoted husband and father. My journey has been diverse and enriching, from serving in the United States Marine Corps to navigating B2B sales for major corporations. These experiences make me adaptable and provide insights into the myriad challenges you might encounter.
